content: @Milo123459 :wave: I wanted to talk more about https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/90323 if you don't mind

I have worked on it pretty actively. The amount of borrowing errors is.. indescribably large.

that is uhhh concerning :sweat_smile: I appreciate you working on it but I don't want it to be too much
would it be easier to only changes small parts of rustdoc to use &mut at first?
so you can do it a bit at a time
I would also put off anything to do with the RefCell until later, just passing &mut is fine for now
Yes, I second this. If you have that many borrow-check errors, we should probably find another way to solve the problem.
Well, this is a large scale type-thing. Lots of code changes. To be honest, I'm not sure if I'm going to be able to finish it.
right - I'm saying we might be able to do fewer changes so it's more doable :)
like, change only the top-level functions to take &mut instead of all of them
can you give a couple examples of errors you're running into right now?
